description: Combine FITS files into a mosaic

parameters.info: The directory containing the input FITS files
parameters.name: input_dir

parameters.info: The header to project to. If this is not specified, then an optimal header is chosen.
parameters.name: header

parameters.info: The table file containing the list of input images. This can be specified to avoid recomputing it every time a mosaic is made from the same set of input files.
parameters.name: image_table

parameters.info: Whether to use MPI whenever possible (requires the MPI-enabled Montage binaries to be installed).
parameters.name: mpi

parameters.info: The number of processes to use if `mpi` is set to `True`
parameters.name: n_proc

parameters.info: Whether to include a background-matching step
parameters.name: background_match

parameters.info: A list of images to use (useful if not all the files inside `input_dir` should be combined).
parameters.name: imglist

parameters.info: Whether the output mosaic should match the input header exactly, or whether the mosaic should be trimmed if possible.
parameters.name: exact_size

parameters.info: Whether to remove any temporary directories used for mosaicking
parameters.name: cleanup

parameters.info: BITPIX value for the ouput FITS file (default is -32). Possible values are: 8 (character or unsigned binary integer), 16 (16-bit integer), 32 (32-bit integer), -32 (single precision floating point), -64 (double precision floating point).
parameters.name: bitpix

parameters.info: When doing background matching, whether to only allow changes in the level of frames, not the slope.
parameters.name: level_only
